verses.verse: Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, Keep <WH8104> <WH8798> ye judgment <WH4941>, and do <WH6213> <WH8798> justice <WH6666>: for my salvation <WH3444> is near <WH7138> to come <WH935> <WH8800>, and my righteousness <WH6666> to be revealed <WH1540> <WH8736>.

Blessed <WH835> is the man <WH582> that doeth <WH6213> <WH8799> this, and the son <WH1121> of man <WH120> that layeth hold <WH2388> <WH8686> on it; that keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> the sabbath <WH7676> from polluting <WH2490> <WH8763> it, and keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> his hand <WH3027> from doing <WH6213> <WH8800> any evil <WH7451>.

Neither let the son <WH1121> of the stranger <WH5236>, that hath joined <WH3867> <WH8738> himself to the YY <WH3068>, speak <WH559> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The YY <WH3068> hath utterly <WH914> <WH8687> separated <WH914> <WH8686> me from his people <WH5971>: neither let the eunuch <WH5631> say <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I am a dry <WH3002> tree <WH6086>.

For thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> unto the eunuchs <WH5631> that keep <WH8104> <WH8799> my sabbaths <WH7676>, and choose <WH977> <WH8804> the things that please <WH2654> <WH8804> me, and take hold <WH2388> <WH8688> of my covenant <WH1285>;

Havahn unto them will I give <WH5414> <WH8804> in mine house <WH1004> and within my walls <WH2346> a place <WH3027> and a name <WH8034> better <WH2896> than of sons <WH1121> and of daughters <WH1323>: I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> them an everlasting <WH5769> name <WH8034>, that shall not be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735>.

Also the sons <WH1121> of the stranger <WH5236>, that join <WH3867> <WH8737> themselves to the YY <WH3068>, to serve <WH8334> <WH8763> him, and to love <WH157> <WH8800> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>, to be his servants <WH5650>, every one that keepeth <WH8104> <WH8802> the sabbath <WH7676> from polluting <WH2490> <WH8763> it, and taketh hold <WH2388> <WH8688> of my covenant <WH1285>;

Havahn them will I bring <WH935> <WH8689> to my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>, and make them joyful <WH8055> <WH8765> in my house <WH1004> of prayer <WH8605>: their burnt offerings <WH5930> and their sacrifices <WH2077> shall be accepted <WH7522> upon mine altar <WH4196>; for mine house <WH1004> shall be called <WH7121> <WH8735> an house <WH1004> of prayer <WH8605> for all people <WH5971>.

The YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> which gathereth <WH6908> <WH8764> the outcasts <WH1760> <WH8737> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> saith <WH5002> <WH8803>, Yet will I gather <WH6908> <WH8762> others to him, beside those that are gathered <WH6908> <WH8737> unto him.
All ye beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, come <WH857> <WH8798> to devour <WH398> <WH8800>, yea, all ye beasts <WH2416> in the forest <WH3293>.

His watchmen <WH6822> <WH8802> are blind <WH5787>: they are all ignorant <WH3045> <WH8804>, they are all dumb <WH483> dogs <WH3611>, they cannot <WH3201> <WH8799> bark <WH5024> <WH8800>; sleeping <WH1957> <WH8802>, lying down <WH7901> <WH8802>, loving <WH157> <WH8802> to slumber <WH5123> <WH8800>.

Yea, they are greedy <WH5794> <WH5315> dogs <WH3611> which can <WH3045> <WH8804> never have <WH3045> <WH8804> enough <WH7654>, and they are shepherds <WH7462> <WH8802> that cannot understand <WH995> <WH8687>: they all look <WH6437> <WH8804> to their own way <WH1870>, every one <WH376> for his gain <WH1215>, from his quarter <WH7097>.

Come <WH857> <WH8798> ye, say they, I will fetch <WH3947> <WH8799> wine <WH3196>, and we will fill <WH5433> <WH8799> ourselves with strong drink <WH7941>; and to morrow <WH4279> shall be as this day <WH3117>, and much <WH3966> more <WH3499> abundant <WH1419>.
